thread.title: Recycled CO2 shoes with no carbon footprint

title: Recycled CO2 shoes with no carbon footprint
text:
Recycled CO2 shoes with no carbon footprint Monday, March 12, 2018 - 02:00 
A New York product development firm creates a ''footprintless'' shoe from recycled CO2 to showcase progressive, new ways to capture gaseous waste from power plants. Elly Park reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A New York product development firm creates a "footprintless" shoe from recycled CO2 to showcase progressive, new ways to capture gaseous waste from power plants. Elly Park reports.
